explains: adj. （建筑物、车辆等）摇摇欲坠的，破烂不堪的；（组织或体制）松散的，东拼西凑的

sentences.en: They joined with a ramshackle alliance of other rebels.
sentences.cn: 他们加入了一个其他反叛分子拼凑起来的联盟。

sentences.en: They entered the shop, which was a curious ramshackle building.
sentences.cn: 他们走进商店，那是一所奇怪、摇摇欲坠的房子。

sentences.en: He had run a ramshackle ship-chandlers establishment at Cyclops Wharf on the West Ferry Road.
sentences.cn: 他曾在西轮渡道的独眼巨人码头经营一家摇摇欲坠的船吊灯店。
